website_summaries.verdict: This brightly colored, gender-neutral ball pit doubles as a pool for fun in any weather.
pros: Colorful, inflatable 3-ring ball pit comes with 25 balls
cons: Doesn't come with enough balls to fill it
No drain in the floor if you use it as a pool

customer_reviews.title: Hi everybody
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun pool, I play with my duckies and my tummy started to rumble, but no worry I have cottonelle, anywho this thing is the best for my son but we’ll he seems to have a phobia of water and with this comes oh no I’m not getting the pool stuff. Not me I’m gettin my moneys worth, here I am 31, in the backyard with a glass of wine and my husband and son watching me like I’m crazy. I’m not crazy, I’m adventurous.
customer_reviews.author: JNR87

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product for multiple reasons. It is only 3 foot wide so it is small enough to be used in the house as a ball pit for a 9 month old. Short enough he can climb into it easily but wide enough for him to enjoy without taking up half a room. In the summer he can take it outside and use it as a kiddie pool. I chose this over all the other options because of the Fisher Price brand and the bright colors. It is nice because it came with a patch kit. Even though product is durable, kids will be kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kindlemenow

customer_reviews.title: A 1 year old must have
customer_reviews.text: I have this filled with 200 play plastic balls in my living room and its my sons go to toy! We inflated it 3 months ago and it's still going strong. No leaks or punctures. If you do fill it with plastic balls it's easy to clean i just put the couch attachment on my vacuum cleaner and swirl it around. I have 3 golden retrievers and doing this keeps it spotless and hair free.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's good for indoor or outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: Top tube went flat right away due to a tiny hole. Other than that it's good for indoor or outdoor play. I bought more balls because the 25 it comes with weren't enough for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great ball pit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is absolutely obsessed with this. We use it as a ball pit and put a slide to go into it. Perfect size to have in the house without taking too much room. My daughter is 18 months
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Durable perfect for baby-4
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Purchased it plus balls for inside use for my one year old and even my four year old and two year old love it. It’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Colorful. Perfect size for my grandson. Filled with colored balls and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: MikiDi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made for fisher price
customer_reviews.text: Does not blow up totally round and tight and bottom flat and can tear easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality no matter how many times a blow up won’t stay never even got to use it doesn’t blow up as a circle waste of money wouldn’t put my 2 year old in it
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Pros-multi functional, colorful, fast shipping, comes with 25 balls Cons-needs many more balls, small (can fit 1-2 small babies/toddlers)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wise

product_meta.title: Bestway 93501 Fisher-Price Paddling Pool with 25 Ball Toys
product_meta.description: The Fisher-Price "3-Ring" paddling pool invites our little ones to splash and play. The paddling pool with three equal air rings in a colourful design is filled with either water or the included 25 play balls and thus guarantees hours of pleasure. Immerse yourself in a world of fun with the Fisher Price 3 Ring Paddling Pool.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
